name: Apollo 11 (SiboraS)
description:
Apollo 11

Loja konsiston ne 3 nivele qe ndryshojne nga gjatesia, niveli i veshtiresise, fortesia e armiqve etj.

Credits:

Sibora Sulaj

FSHN

Tirane, 2022

Instructions:

After Neil Armstrong landed on the Moon on his Apollo 11 mission, there was a brief moment when connection with Earth was lost. He was captured by aliens and taken to a secret base.

Help Neil get back to his spaceship by escaping the alien facility.

Use AWSD or the arrow keys to move and press Space bar to jump. Press Esc to pause the game.

Ndryshime:

  1. Krijimi i nje Rotating Animated Tile
  2. Shtova levizjen me shigjeta (Jump me Up Arrow etj)
  3. Shtova dy nivele te reja
  4. Krijova Full Lives Pickup
  5. Ndryshova muziken per t'ju pershtatur temes: 
    1. Ne Main Menu vendosa komunikimin e Neil Armstrong me bazen e NASA ne Houston
    2. Ne nivele vendosa hite te viteve '60
  6. Shtova elementet qe mungonin ne Main Menu (Instructions, Credits, Level 3 Selection Button etj)
  7. Shtova High Score
  8. Bera background e Main Camera te zeze
  9. Ndryshova ngjyrat e butonave ne Main Menu dhe te armiqve neper nivele.
